title: Ranked placing is bugged
body: hey I won 8/10 provisional games with great kda got bronze 2. My friend won 1 game and had a bad kda every game and dragged his team down and got bronze 1? What is this Riot? Thats dodgy guys. Honestly last year i won 5 out of 10 games in my provisionals and got silver 5. I dont understand how a player that won 8 games gets bronze 2 and a player that wins 1 gets bronze 1? Please explain. Btw i play supp if that helps.

replies.body: It's all got to do with MMR, not rank. You can be Silver 5 and still have the MMR of low bronze. It also works the other way, you can be Silver 5 and have the MMR of mid/high silver.
Riot took your rank into concideration this time.
